## Description {#details}

LowerIntrinsics - This pass rewrites calls to the llvm.gcread or llvm.gcwrite intrinsics, replacing them with simple loads and stores as directed by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy">GCStrategy</a>.

It also performs automatic root initialization and custom intrinsic lowering.

This pass requires <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/collectormetadataanalysis">CollectorMetadataAnalysis</a></code>.

Definition at line 195 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/gcmetadata-h">GCMetadata.h</a>.
